en.title: Backend Development
en.description: Experienced in building robust backend systems using Java, PHP, and frameworks like Quarkus, including API design, database integration, and efficient data management.

es.title: Razvoj Pozadinskih Sistema
es.description: Iskusan u izradi robusnih backend sistema koristeći Java, PHP i okvire poput Quarkus-a, uključujući dizajn API-ja, integraciju baza podataka i efikasno upravljanje podacima.

en.title: Web Application Development
en.description: Proficient in creating dynamic and responsive web applications using PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Vue.js, ensuring smooth performance across devices.

es.title: Razvoj Web Aplikacija
es.description: Vješt u kreiranju dinamičnih i responzivnih web aplikacija koristeći PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS i Vue.js, uz obezbjeđenje besprekornog rada na svim uređajima.

en.title: Responsive Layouts
en.description: Capable of building user-friendly interfaces and maintaining consistent user experiences with modern frontend technologies.

es.title: Responzivni Dizajn
es.description: Sposoban za kreiranje korisnički prijatnih interfejsa uz dosljedno korisničko iskustvo koristeći moderne frontend tehnologije.

en.title: Academic & Prototype Projects
en.description: Experienced in translating academic requirements into functional software solutions, with a focus on clean code, documentation, and proof-of-concept builds.

es.title: Akademski i Prototip Projekti
es.description: Iskustvo u prevođenju akademskih zahtjeva u funkcionalna softverska rješenja, uz fokus na čist kod, dokumentaciju i izradu prototipa.

en.title: Database Design
en.description: Adept at designing, optimizing, and integrating relational databases such as MySQL or Postgres for seamless application performance.

es.title: Dizajn Baza Podataka
es.description: Vješt u dizajniranju, optimizaciji i integraciji relacionih baza podataka kao što su MySQL i Postgres radi nesmetanog rada aplikacija.

en.title: Plugin Development
en.description: Skilled in developing Minecraft plugins with Java and the Spigot API, delivering engaging gameplay experiences.

es.title: Razvoj Pluginova
es.description: Iskusan u razvoju Minecraft pluginova koristeći Java i Spigot API, pružajući zanimljivo iskustvo igranja.

en.title: HTML 5
en.description: Experienced with HTML5 elements and features.

es.title: HTML 5
es.description: Iskusan u HTML5 elementima i funkcionalnostima.

en.title: CSS 3
en.description: Skilled in advanced CSS3 techniques like flexbox and animations.

es.title: CSS 3
es.description: Vješt u naprednim CSS3 tehnikama kao što su flexbox i animacije.

en.title: Javascript
en.description: Skilled in JavaScript for dynamic, interactive web applications.

es.title: Javascript
es.description: Vješt u JavaScript-u za dinamične i interaktivne web aplikacije.

en.title: Vue 3
en.description: Capable of building and deploying Vue applications.

es.title: Vue 3
es.description: Sposoban da razvija i implementira Vue aplikacije.

en.title: Relational Databases
en.description: Skilled in managing MySQL, Postgres databases, including schema design and query optimization.

es.title: Relacione Baze Podataka
es.description: Vješt u upravljanju MySQL i Postgres bazama podataka, uključujući dizajn šema i optimizaciju upita.

en.title: PHP
en.description: Experienced in building dynamic web apps with PHP, including server-side logic and database integration.

es.title: PHP
es.description: Iskusan u razvoju dinamičnih web aplikacija koristeći PHP, uključujući logiku na strani servera i integraciju baza podataka.

en.title: English
en.description: Fluent in both spoken and written English; confident in professional communication.

es.title: Engleski
es.description: Tečno govori i piše engleski jezik; siguran u profesionalnoj komunikaciji.
